about.name: Fuzzle
about.desc: Fuzzle is an innovative, patent-pending weight management system designed to help users control hunger cues and improve their overall well-being.

projectTeam.desc: The team consisted of two UI designers and one UX designer along with the project owner. The entire project was completed in 2 months.

problem.desc: Many individuals struggle with discipline when following diet plans, leading to inconsistent adherence. Fuzzle addresses this challenge by implementing a mechanism to physically restrict eating and enforcing compliance through reminders and tracking features.

goals.title: User Goal
goals.desc: Design and develop an application to help users plan meals, manage diets, and track fitness metrics.

goals.title: Business Goal
goals.desc: Enhance user engagement by providing interactive and effective features to address the target audience's needs.

solution.desc: CreativeScript delivered a feature-packed app including meal logging, customized meal plans, notifications, weight and glucose monitoring, community features, physical activity tracking, and streak management. The app's minimal and user-friendly design ensures seamless navigation.

targetAudience: Individuals aged 25–55, male and female, with sedentary or office-going lifestyles in the US
Individuals seeking tools for meal planning, fitness tracking, and weight management
behindTheScenes.marketAnalysis: Studied existing applications in the domain to understand the best-performing features and user flows.
behindTheScenes.userFlow: Created and refined a user flow incorporating functionalities like meal planning, activity timers, and a chatbot.
problemsIdentified: Initial lack of clarity around required features necessitated extensive exploration and brainstorming.
Designing and iterating on the app’s flow to ensure ease of use and intuitive navigation.

ui.approach: Adopted a dark theme with purple accents to align with the client's branding and resonate with the target audience.

achievements: Designed and developed the Fuzzle app with a comprehensive feature set to tackle meal tracking and fitness management challenges.
Conducted thorough market analysis and iterative design processes to meet user needs.
Provided a comprehensive solution to help users improve their overall health.

clientFeedback.desc: Re-designed the app with a fresh outlook, focusing on simplicity and usability improvements.
